item.s: World 's finest collection of submarine artifacts and home of the USS Nautilus , the first nuclear sub .
Traces development of subs from Revolutionary War times .
Admission , including self-guided tour of USS Nautilus , is free , but donations invited .
Although the name implies a steak house it is similar to Benihana in the Teppenyaki side of the house .
But , where the place really shines is their sushi .
The chef is a Japanese national who is very skilled and quite innovative at making sushi .
They regularly import fish from Japan and it is fantastic .
It rivals some of the best NY sushi restaurants and by far exceeds anything in the area .

The Hampton Inn Groton hotel is a gateway to downtown Groton and minutes away from
Mystic
.
Easily accessible from I-95 North and South and centrally located near major businesses .

Features four stories with 80 rooms , including 4 king suites , a complimentary deluxe continental breakfast , indoor heated pool , meeting room for 65 people , exercise room and business center with complimentary high-speed internet and ATM .

Great for business travel since it is close to General Dynamics-Electric Boat Corporation , Dow Chemical , USS Submarine Base New London/Groton , Connecticut College , US Coast Guard Academy , Mitchell College , The Day Paper , Lawrence and Memorial Hospital , Sonalysts Studios Inc. and Pfizer .
A cheap place to crash very near New London and just across the street from the Groton Inn and Suites .
The place is no nonsense and simple but it is clean and well maintained and an excellent bargain . ~$ 50 .
